## MakeNullable type

Makes specified keys of an interface nullable while the rest stay the same.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type MakeNullable<GType extends {}, GKeys extends Key<GType>> = Omit<GType, GKeys> & {
    [P in GKeys]: GType[P] | null;
};
```
